A career in #realestate for me is about purpose, impact, friendships and being a part of something bigger than myself.  As a former sports marketing professional and entrepreneur, I used the inspiration from one of my favorite quotes "You Miss 100% of the Shots You Don't Take" to honor this new chapter in my career by sitting open 100 homes by the end of 2017.  The campaign kicked off August 1, and today I’m in #McCormickRanch sitting open #home50of100.  As I reflect back on the first 50 #open houses, the consequences that have materialized in the process of committing to becoming consistent and trying to bring value each and everyday are RESULTS!  Only half way to my goal, I look forward to executing the second half of my #openhouse challenge by continuing to serve clients and the greater phoenix community with the same passion, determination, and purpose as the first 50.  #100OpenHomes #OpenHouseChallenge #wexlerrealtygroup #realtyexecutives #buyersagent #sellersagent #scottsdalerealestate #phoenixrealestate #azrealtor

The purpose of pledger is simple; a digital medium purposefully designed to engage and activate sports fans through the power of real-time athleticism, heroism and story.  Pledger utilizes real time game performance statistics to trigger charity donations from sports fans.  With pledger fans become true brand partners - They no longer just watch - they participate and connect with their favorite players and teams in real time.At Pledger, we believe that greatness is a common word used to describe all-star athletes.   Greatness, however, extends far beyond superior athletic prowess and individual competitive excellence. True greatness, in our opinion, enriches an athlete’s and an organization’s purpose. It embodies that pull inside each and every one of us to stand up, be an example, and give back to those who have supported us along our journey. It’s about inspiration.  Pledger illuminates the stories and personalities behind our modern day superheroes and teams. It invites fans and brands to digitally stand beside their athlete and team, honoring their mission to support those in need of a hero. Join Pledger and you’ll not only invest in your athlete and team—you’ll make a difference in somebody’s world.

Relentless, Inc. is a film and digital media firm that specializes in telling stories that inspire people, enhance culture and change industries.  As Business Development Director, I reported directly to the President and CEO and was primarily tasked with building and developing new leads and client acquisition across the Phoenix Metropolitan area.  Also, I also served as a creative liaison to existing customers and projects.  I collaborated with colleagues on creative briefs, helped draft and review proposals, and represented Relentless at events deemed important to building branded content.Here’s our area of expertise:Pre-Production — Creative direction, story development, script writing, storyboarding, illustrations, etc… This is where the story is developed and born.Production — This is where the moment is first captured. We bring out all the necessary equipment to tell your story, completely.  Through video, animation and digital media, our team of creatives has the pleasure of collaborating with some of the most influential brands and names in the world.Post-Production — After filming, we take all our raw footage and turn it into art, a story that can be shared with everyone.

Emerging Leaders - Signature Event and Giving Committee

The Signature Event Committee works with the Board to plan and implement the Emerging Leaders’ annual signature event. This Committee also coordinates efforts related to the group’s philanthropic endeavors, including identifying significant funding opportunities, coordinating fundraising events and additional outreach that is intended to generate revenue for Phoenix Children’s Hospital.

I foresee a successful and innovative future for Tim.

summary: Tim McBride is an accomplished REALTOR® and local area expert who brings a personable approach to the home buying and home selling process.  As the #1 Buyer’s Agent for the #1 agent at Realty Execs and the #3 Agent in Scottsdale,  Tim draws from years of experience in finance, real estate, and as a business owner in the sports and entertainment business.  Tim has built a reputation for his ‘customer first’ approach and proven ability to guide buyers to obtain the best price for their dream home and to assist sellers in a smooth, stress-free sale of their home.   Tim draws on his entrepreneurial passion and sharp attention to detail to help buyers in a highly focused search for their new house and to help sellers get the most value for their home. Tim understands that buying and selling are one of the biggest decisions in a client's life and views representation and guidance of his clients through this process as a true privilege. As Tim says, “ my only ‘interest’ is my client’s best interest."  Originally from Vancouver Canada, Tim is a proud father and husband and considers that to be his biggest accomplishments.
name: Tim McBride
title: REALTOR®  | Partner | Wexler Realty Group
